items.details: After months of hard work and dedication, I'm thrilled to announce the official launch of StudiLib! This app is designed to help students manage their study sessions effectively, incorporating techniques like the Pomodoro method to enhance focus and productivity. With features like customisable study and break intervals, progress tracking, and motivational quotes, StudiLib aims to make studying more engaging and efficient. I can't wait for students around the world to try it out and benefit from its features!

items.description: The first concept of StudiLib was born
items.details: I have a group of friends that study together quite a lot, even online. We always struggled to keep track of our study sessions, breaks, and goals. I thought, why not create an app that makes this easier and more fun? Thus, the idea for StudiLib was born.
